website_summaries.verdict: A tough hiker meant for traversing moderate terrain in the summer, the Accentor 2 Vent Mid gets tons of great feedback for being downright comfortable. It also ticks the box for lightness, grip, and quality. What's more, many buyers are satisfied with its price. It's an affordable, reliable hiking boot for its class.This suede boot is definitely crafted for all-day comfort on the trail. Too bad it runs narrow. But overall, this hiker is a wonderful choice for anyone looking for a lightweight, breathable hiking boot.
pros: Numerous Merrell Accentor 2 Vent Mid reviews say that this hiking boot is comfortable right from the box
Many people find this lightweight hiking footwear to be very supportive
Lots of customers are satisfied with the quality of the Merrell Accentor 2 Vent mid hiking boots
Some say this boot can last 1,000-1,500 miles
A handful of hikers give it top remarks for its great traction
Many verified buyers agree that this hiking boot from Merrell is reasonably priced
cons: Several people are disappointed that this shoe runs narrow
The boot squeaks, which is an annoyance for some

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after 1 month!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been wearing these shoes for about 4 weeks now and just yesterday he noticed that the some of the shoe is starting to fall apart, pieces are peeling away and tearing off. He only uses these shoes to work in (he works as a mechanic on cars) so the only abuse they've seen is repeated motion of bending at the toes when he is kneeling down. We are disappointed that for nearly $100 we only got about 1 months wear from them before they started falling apart. We will not be buying this brand any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Karissa Rea

customer_reviews.title: A sweat factory.
customer_reviews.text: I love Merrell's... most of the time. I also must admit that waterproof boots, due to keeping out moisture just don't breathe as well, so your feet are going to sweat. However, my Ecco's are fine, so are my Keen's. Anyway, they are a comfortable fit and appear to be holding up well, I simply need less heat and sweat...very uncomfortable. I will probably have to stop wearing them altogether. My Merrell shoes rock though. I will avoid waterproof Merrell's in the future due to the membrane they use.
customer_reviews.author: Matt J.

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair of Merrells. My last pair finally died after several years of everyday shoes from September- April. I'm not hiker or anything I just like the way they look and they are very comfortable shoes. Hopefully these live up to my expectations based on my last pair. I've only had them for about a week now, I did Snowblow driveway and cleared the walkways with them on and my feet were dry. I thought about getting Keens but I went with these because I loved my last pair of Merrells.
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: Bought these based on very similar earlier model. Old ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these based on very similar earlier model. Old ones have not worn out, so I use old pair as work, and new pair for hiking or when in public. No need to break-in. waterproof up to top edge. lightweight. can wear all day long. (But I I use an insert for arch support)
customer_reviews.author: Georgetown Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Feels like tennis shoes
customer_reviews.text: The sole design looks to hold up well, especially the heel. Good traction for scrambling - almost like rock climbing boots. Comfortable and stable for walking. Lighter than I expected. Compared to other hiking boots that I've worn, these feel as light and flexible as tennis shoes, with the protection of hiking boots. Would highly recommend for day hikes or as an all purpose boot. Might be too light for backpackers or technical climbing as an only shoe worn, maybe as a back up.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boots!
customer_reviews.text: First pair of Merrill boots since 2005. I am so grateful and thankful to have been able to purchase these awesome boots. The construction, the design, the comfort is amazing. These particular model boots are definitely cut smaller than my other boots. I wear a 12 1/2; I ordered a 13; yet the 13 fits exactly like a 12 1/2. Weird; yet totally cool with it. These are in fact terrific boots for walking, standing and light hiking. Bought these boots at a fantastic price! Thank you "Peltz" and Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Winning777

customer_reviews.title: Buh them now! Great hiker!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 12 wide. These are hands down (feet too), THE most comfy pair of hikers I have ever put on. I have been wearing them as my every day footwear since i bought them a month ago.
customer_reviews.author: Fn' BALDGUY

customer_reviews.title: other than the squeaking is comfortable and fits like all my other Merrells
customer_reviews.text: Soles are begging to 'squeak'. Only had them a month or two. Disappointing. Boot itself, other than the squeaking is comfortable and fits like all my other Merrells.
customer_reviews.author: RCBS

customer_reviews.title: Recommended. Good water repelling.
customer_reviews.text: Great hiking shoes.. I broke them by wearing them in the city for a couple of times. Then did a couple of winter hikes. I got into water streams and got wet in both hikes and they held very well, much better than expected. The water was knee high. Although water temp was close to freezing, my feet remain warm, which is important for me. I like the ankle support and the fit. The size is true. I gave them four stars because the contours of the inner soles don't go very well with my feet. I expect them to soften a bit and that would not be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: My girl's a landscaper on her feet in all weather, all day. She gets them soaking wet on the outside and they remain dry on the inside. Look, with the beating she puts them through, she goes thru 2 pair a year. I purchase 2 pair at a time so she has alternates them (as a person should that wears boots every day) every other day. For the price, look, fit and performance - while a year is not that long - they're awesome. Remember, they are not steel toed.
customer_reviews.author: hooah

customer_reviews.title: Good Ankle Support, Comfortable, Well Made
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pair, this one and the Merrell Outpost, to compare and decide which one to keep. Chose this one. Seemed better made, sturdier, definitely better ankle support, arch support more comfortable, and reviews were better overall. Hope the arch support holds up, if not, will buy new arch support inserts if necessary. Most important to me now is Waterproof as I'll be using them for snowshoeing. Hiked in snow the other day (not deep, well used trail) and no issues. Have a pair of Merrell Moab hiking shoes and still love them.
customer_reviews.author: Pam K

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to go camping, hiking, and other such frolics in nature. These are, by far, the most instantly comfortable and easy to wear boots I've ever owned. I haven't worn them in the rain yet but they were stellar on a cold, muddy morning. I'm sure I will be wearing these for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Worst hiking boot ever
customer_reviews.text: Worst hiking boots ever. I always buy Merrell sneakers so I assumed their boots were great too. I've worn them on 3 hikes. After the first one I thought maybe they just need a break in. But after the 2nd & 3rd, nope they're trash. Their water resistant, but not proof. They provide no support. I got blisters in places I've never gotten blisters before. They have zero traction. I'd have been better off hiking in a pair of Converse.
customer_reviews.author: Abbi N.

customer_reviews.title: broke 3 days in
customer_reviews.text: these are the most comfortable shoe i've probably ever worn, however three days in and one of the little straps that hold the shoe lace broke off. Quite disappointed cant even send them back due to the fact ive thrown old shoes away already and dont have another pair to ware.Crossing my fingers hoping the glue holds it down. Update. Terrible for the money I would expect this from a $20 dollar shoe but not from these. Threads are breaking where the shoelaces go through are breaking and haven't even had them a year. But it does deserve one star for the breathable feature when the side started to fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Merrell Men's Accentor Mid Vent Waterproof Hiking Boot
customer_reviews.text: I like the boots, the only negative side is I wear a 10 W boot and it was recommended the 10 regular would fit, however they are too narrow. Hopefully they will break in through time.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Ehlers

customer_reviews.title: Lace it up....
customer_reviews.text: These are some very nice hiking / walking mid-boots. They were tight at first but after about a week of wear, they are super comfortable. Breathable, and "No outside water". Quite OK with that, too! When these wear out - no idea how long that'll be - I'll get another pair. Experience says that boots like this usually last me about 5-7 years with normal wear (once or twice a week - light walking - no long hikes or rough terrain). We'll see what happens but pretty confident that these will follow that pattern. Hopefully so......
customer_reviews.author: J. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Probably won't be buying shoes through Amazon anymore
customer_reviews.text: I've always bought my Merrill's at the store. And figured if I was going to need exact same model and everything it would be fine. But these are imposters possibly they just don't fit right they don't feel right and they seem like they're already falling apart
customer_reviews.author: Scott Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Merrell sucked me back with this model!
customer_reviews.text: I'd had 2-3 pair of the Moab & really liked them (lasted years & retained comfort); and even got my wife into buying them for hiking and daily-outdoor use. Then I got a different style that I wasn't terribly thrilled with; but decided that the company had earned enough respect that I shouldn't walk away due to one bad experience. Last fall I got this pair (the Accentor series) and am back on the "loving it" trail once more. I hunt, fish, hike, and play hard & often; and without my Merrells, I doubt my feet would still love me for it. Thanks very much for restoring my faith in the company & in great-affordable footwear! Kudos guys!
customer_reviews.author: Svendi

customer_reviews.title: Pleased!!
customer_reviews.text: Just took these boots on a 30 mile backpacking trip. They were comfortable and they held up well. Got a little seepage when I crossed a shallow stream but that wasn’t totally unexpected. I will use them again on another long backpacking trip in a few months. Love the ankle support.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Helm

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight with good support
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to hike the Inca Trail in April. They arrived earlier than anticipated and in excellent condition. I have another pair of Merrell hikers, but needed a pair with ankle support. I ordered my usual shoe size and they fit perfect. They're very comfortable and I especially like that they are lightweight. Already wearing them to get them broke in before my hike and I already love them!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly J.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, fell apart after a year.
customer_reviews.text: My husband has had these since Feb 2019 and they've completely fallen apart. Parts of the soul are peeling off, where the fabric meets the rubber on the sides is completely separated. His Colombia's lasted for years, these shoes are crap and he's really disappointed. They're great short-term but long-term, they do not last.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Merrell needs to keep making this shoe style
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorites hiking shoes, and they have excellent grip. The waterproofing is great for those muddy hikes. These last about 1,000-1,500 miles unless you drag your feet when walking. The insole is not the best and needs to be swapped out.
customer_reviews.author: jmumv

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I liked these for about 3 months, then the soles started to sink in spots. I love the breathability of merrell hiking boots, and I use fleet feet insoles. I work outside 50% of the time in orchards and vineyards and need great hiking boots. These did well for a little while, and I am still wearing them, but I am disappointed in the lifespan of the soles.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Comforatable
customer_reviews.text: I like Merrell because they are always nice and comfortable out of the box. Their quality keeps getting worse and worse though. I have only wore them for a couple months now and they are already turning into junk.
customer_reviews.author: stewwr

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Am looking forward to trying out these hiking shoes on an upcoming trip to Ireland. Around the house and outside, they are just fine. One foot is slightly larger than the other, so one shoe was initially more comfortable, but the comfort level is equal now.
customer_reviews.author: LCS

customer_reviews.title: Great boot so far
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these boots a 1/2 size larger than usual because of my past experience with Merrell boot sizing, ordering off of Amazon. I usually wear a size 11 but went with 11.5 and they fit perfectly. Comfortable right out of the box and very light. I will use these boots for everyday wear and 3-season hiking (I have a pair of Merrell winter hikers that are well-insulated, and these boots are not). Not sure about how water-proof they are, so I might expand on this review in the future. I am hopeful they will hold up and wear well, but only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Erik A.

customer_reviews.title: I need to hear from Amazon!!
customer_reviews.text: I sent these boots back over a week, with the shipping label that Amazon sent me by email. I haven’t heard anything from Amazon!! I were an 11, but the boots were a full size to small!
customer_reviews.author: Elson Snider

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: The only disappointing part is the laces seem a little cheap, you have to double knot them or they willcome untied frequently, i work on concrete all day so needed a shoe for that and my outdoor lifestyle, seems to fit both purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Robert MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Wore these boots on a 9 mile hike without breaking them in and my feet didn't hurt a bit. Also very waterproof. I walked up to my ankles in a river and my feet stayed dry and warm. Unfortunately, if the snow's above your ankles, you're going to have wet feet all day as waterproof boots keep water out but also keep it in if snow gets in the top.
customer_reviews.author: hometeach6

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes just days before doing some serious hiking in Utah. Shoes fit perfectly. Very comfortable hiking boot. No break-in period needed. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots
customer_reviews.text: Super nice boots. Fit as expected. Very waterproof and they hold up and look nice. You definitely need to double tie the laces or they are constantly coming undone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Delivered fast as usual. Boots fit great and are extremely comfortable for work everyday. Perfect for walking my job sites and climbing my framed buildings all day.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: NIce!
customer_reviews.text: I read a couple reviews about the width. I wear So Cal thongs 90% of the time X 50 years. Worried they would be too narrow. Fit perfectly, with support. True to size. Had a moment there for a minute when heel of right shoe didn't feel right. The lump evened out after an hour of walking. Outstanding boot! Don't give up if it's weird out of the box. I Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Charles S.

customer_reviews.title: Defective after 1 use
customer_reviews.text: Worn 1 time and shoelace holder broke. I have had other merrell hiking boots and they were great. I will be contacting merrell.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight confortable fit waterproof I buy merrels exclusively exspecially if they are under 100 dollars in mu size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of walking shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I've had these shoes for a couple years not. They are attractive in my opinion, comfortable and durable. They have worn well and feet as expected.
customer_reviews.author: ryeholt

customer_reviews.title: Good Boot !
customer_reviews.text: looks good , fits is true to size , comfortable, very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Kwheeler89

customer_reviews.title: Well-designed
customer_reviews.text: These boots have a single pair of cleats for the laces at the top. Exactly the way it should be - you can draw the laces to tighten them up, then secure them on the one cleat pair at the top. Good traction. Good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Patient Researcher

customer_reviews.title: Go with half size smaller.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are good. Slightly larger than expected. If you wear size 12, go with 11.5.
customer_reviews.author: Weaponeer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes great price
customer_reviews.text: A little narrow and slightly smaller than the ones i tried on in a store. But still really good. I will buy a half size bigger next tine
customer_reviews.author: anthony mannarino

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: The boots are still rather new, but for now they seem to be as good as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: mgberg

customer_reviews.title: Very good boot at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: These boots are doing well after a few short urban hikes on soggy terrain. They will take a few more miles to break in.
customer_reviews.author: J Ward

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for hiking
customer_reviews.text: Great traction. Good snug fit so my large feet don't drift too far left or right. I have really bad, arthritic feet, but still hike a lot. I add a couple Dr. Schol's foot pads and I get good comfort on soles.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Zeitler

customer_reviews.title: Average quality
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I wore them for a couple of months before the tread started to fall off. For a $100 I would expect them to last at least a year. I have had other hiking boots for this price that have lasted years.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Ron

customer_reviews.title: Hiking boots
customer_reviews.text: Awesome hiking boots, I receive many compliments on them. Would definitely buy again and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Should be called wet shoes
customer_reviews.text: your feet will get soaking wet and if the shoe laces do not trip you up and make you fall without a doubt the worst pair of boots or shoes I've ever bought my life will never ever buy anything from this company again
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: great shoe
customer_reviews.text: these fit right on target and I walk 3 to 7 miles a day, they are water proof up to 1 inch of water only though,walking through tall wet grass does not keep water out, traction is just ok, this shoe mostly works well on dry serfaces. but otherwise good shoe.breathes well
customer_reviews.author: Sherman Wong

customer_reviews.title: My favorite brand
customer_reviews.text: Merrell has repeatedly sold me with comfort and quality. They have become my go to shoe for running, hiking, and now I see they even have some dress shoes. I’ll be trying those. These hiking boots are extremely comfortable and required virtually no break in time. I should’ve bought 2 pairs!
customer_reviews.author: Clay Maloy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy but very comfortable, especially when I wear them with Swiftwick Pursuit socks. My last pair lasted for years. Hope to get the same out of these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: These are exceptionally comfortable straight out of the box and are far my favorite hiking boot, particularly for the money. Twice I’ve landed my foot in a stream nearly to the top of the boot and both times my socks were 100% dry!!! I love these Merrill boots.
customer_reviews.author: Deana Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Great boot.
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of these boots finally wore through the soles after 12 years of daily use. This new pair is very comfortable and supportive and I look forward to another 12 years.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart McFarland

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on these. I believe that they are no longer a current shoe as it was no longer on the Merrell site. Fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jef Smith

customer_reviews.title: These boots are very nice.
customer_reviews.text: I was happy that my boots arrived on time and we’re well packaged. My new boots fit well, appear to be well made and are warm. I was also happy to see that half sizes are also available.
customer_reviews.author: Diane M.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHOE
customer_reviews.text: KEEPS ME DRY,I GO WALKING EVERY MORNING IN THE PARK AND THERE IS ALWAYS DEW AND I STAY DRY
customer_reviews.author: JDEN

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant in ordering shoes online. But I'm very pleased with this purchase. Very comfortable and size is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J.

customer_reviews.title: good feel, odd squeak?
customer_reviews.text: love everything about them other than the strange squeak like noise one of them makes
customer_reviews.author: G. S.

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Boots are fine, but I wear a 10 and ordered a 10 I have the exact pair from a couple of years ago which were 10's but the new ones are to tight.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Overton

customer_reviews.title: Merrell boots rating.
customer_reviews.text: I expected them to fit better. They're a little too small. They also don't seem to be totally waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Peplinski

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof, durable, comfortable, secure
customer_reviews.text: Went through the Great Swamps of NJ with these boots! Held up in some muddy, swampy areas! Did not get wet inside even when I walked through some swampy puddles. Love the ankle support! Went with my actual size 8.5. My Nike running shoe is a 9, and a 9 would have been way too big in this boot.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Psolka

customer_reviews.title: Fits as is expected.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered a size bigger but should have stuck to his size. Sent back for smaller size
customer_reviews.author: H.M.B

customer_reviews.title: Merrell is Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: These boots are comfortable. The soles have nice deep tread. Merrell's have always provided us years of service at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy J. Holbert

customer_reviews.title: Comfortably and affordable...maaaaannnn
customer_reviews.text: Greatest boots ever. Only docked a star because they sent the wrong color.
customer_reviews.author: wolfc

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very nice hiking boot, extremely comfortable and appears to be durable.
customer_reviews.author: Lauan Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable. Waterproof. Quality workmanship.
customer_reviews.text: Merrill has never let me down. These replaced a 6-year old pair for a new job. They just do what you expect - keep your feet dry, comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: they're merrells, enough said for me
customer_reviews.text: a brand that fits my foot like a glove. they feel good on my feet, and that's all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: mike raney

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: This is a comfortable, quality hiking boot. Seriously waterproof! We hiked the Grand Canyon and many trails in Arizona and back home in Ohio! These keep my feet warm and tight!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Merrell Boots
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier with my purchase. Awesome hiking boots that fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Miller

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable boot. Great job.
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable boot. Very breathable and soft sole. I will purchase a couple of more pairs for work and hiking. I ordered a 1/2 size bigger to be safe, and it's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Very nice boot!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our son, he wears out all the boots we get him in a short time, he hasn’t worn these out yet! Happy with this purchase and so is he!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are perfect as I work in Iraq. Holding good so far. Very comfortable..
customer_reviews.author: Steve D. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Will never wear anything else while hunting - perfect for bow hunting in Colorado. The sole doesn’t hold up to the South Texas mesquite thorns too well though. Had to stop an pull a couple out. Comfort is unrivaled.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Dukatnik

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste money on anything else
customer_reviews.text: Without question these are the most comfortable shoe/boot I've ever put on my feet
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The fit and finish of these is on par with the other shoes I have from Merrell the price was right and I like the other shoes that I have from this company, hopefully these will last just as long.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Order the larger size if in doubt
customer_reviews.text: Definitely run smaller than expected. It recommended I order a 9.5 and I went up a half size to a 10 so I could wear thicker socks. I should have went up a full size instead of a half size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are narrow shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my size, the left fit ok but the right was too narrow.
customer_reviews.author: MPag

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these boots and they are nice and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Tyner

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Merrell boots and they are perfect. So comfortable and stylish. I would recommend these to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Water and Snow proof.
customer_reviews.text: Was waterproof and snow proof. A little squeaky indoors but they are made of the outdoors!
customer_reviews.author: William Zernickow

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight with enough stretch to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I've had for a month. So far, so good. Lightweight . . . . very comfortable. The proof will be how waterproof they are when walking through water while checking customers' fields.
customer_reviews.author: Paul NW OH

customer_reviews.title: Hope to resolve an size issue
customer_reviews.text: The boots were a medium width. I wear a wide width. I'm returning them with hopes the seller can send me a size 10 wide width
customer_reviews.author: John Emminger

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Came quick and they are even nicer looking in person. Great comfort and support lightweight and breathable! Really helps me get through long workday on my feet
customer_reviews.author: dominick michael

customer_reviews.title: Good waterproof hiking boot
customer_reviews.text: Got it for 20 mile hike at Havasupai AZ, 11 miles at Big Pine CA. Worked out great. Use it for rainy commutes on the train to work. So far im enjoying the comfort and that it's waterproof to just above my ankle
customer_reviews.author: Axel

customer_reviews.title: Very Stylish and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were perfect. They are very comfortable, good traction, and good support for the ankles!
customer_reviews.author: Natashia Conyers

customer_reviews.title: Tough as nails
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid hiker many miles a year ,this merrell shoe does the job, after year it’s still in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excited for Hiking Trip
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son's trip to Philmont. Can't wait to see how they do!
customer_reviews.author: Brice A. McCauley

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Great boots, very comfortable. Put a lot of miles on them and they’re still holding up. So impressed I bought a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: McCauley, Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Second pair best boots I have ever own. No need for arch support
customer_reviews.author: William Brady

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes run a little small but I got half a size larger. I love these shoes so much that I got 2 pair!
customer_reviews.author: rachael schwantes

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Sowed up late in shipping but good product over all.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Love the boots
customer_reviews.text: Love the boots fit is good easy to order from Amazon with the number match in the boot
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Peabody

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: It's the same shoe I've ordered for years and I think they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great boot
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these boots SO that should say all. great product
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Raykowski

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed boot. Fits to size. Would defiantly buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JEB

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for hiking and all around, great fit and nice construction.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes...this is his second pair, and believe me he can be hard on them, but they last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Theo

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe. Fits great I had to get a size larger because my foot is wide. The shoes are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: They are not waterproof or water resistant. In snow or rain my feet got wet. And in normal weather they don’t breathe so these are no good either way.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin M.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Luv merrells that's the only shoe we purchase for work
customer_reviews.author: D.P.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Great product fast shipping, what more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Jones

customer_reviews.title: Little break in needed
customer_reviews.text: Fit my son perfect- same size as his Nike sneakers. Very comfortable and little break in needed
customer_reviews.author: Mark Atanasoff

customer_reviews.title: Seams failed.
customer_reviews.text: Seems have already failed and are no longer water proof. Lasted 3 months of 3 miles a day.
customer_reviews.author: william farmer

product_meta.title: Merrell Accentor 2 Mid Ventilator Waterproof Men's UK
product_meta.description: These suede mountain boots fit your foot to offer you maximum comfort during a long day of hiking.
feature_bullets: Mid version of the Accentor 2 offers extra protection and support for your ankles
Merrell Air Cushion in the heel absorbs shock and adds stability
